text:
Tomorrow at 16:00 UTC (19:00 MSK), [TON Real Talk](https://x.com/toncommunityhq/status/1945491110308262291) ‚Äî *NFTs: Utility, Culture & Memes* will take place on the [Ton Community](https://x.com/toncommunityhq) page featuring an official representative of Pudgy Penguins ‚Äî [pp](https://x.com/ppmctweets)! 

Our club will be represented by @baron_hatter!

Thanks to the activity of[ Iceberg](https://t.me/LiveIceberg), our community members prepared thoughtful questions for the speakers. We also created a powerful video teaser with the help of a[ top-notch specialist](https://t.me/Olga_Voskanian) and became a vital connector for everyone involved.

Get your JETPACKS ready! üöÄ
